name: Resources
tagline: Resources is the collection of all the resources for coding a web based app.
body:
# Resources

Resources is the collection of all the resources for coding a web based app.

If something is changed or is wrong please raise an issue.

---

## Table of Contents

- [Installation Nginx, HHVM, MySQL, and phpMyAdmin](https://github.com/harshitvsaxena/Resources/tree/master/Installation-Nginx-HHVM-MySQL-and-phpMyAdmin)
- [NodeJS](https://github.com/harshitvsaxena/Resources/tree/master/NodeJS)
  - [Installing NodeJS and NPM](https://github.com/harshitvsaxena/Resources/tree/master/NodeJS/installing_nodejs_and_npm.md)
  - [package.json in NodeJS](https://github.com/harshitvsaxena/Resources/tree/master/NodeJS/package_dot_json_in_nodejs.md)
  - [NodeJS and MySQL](https://github.com/harshitvsaxena/Resources/tree/master/NodeJS/nodejs_and_mysql.md)
- [Nginx and NodeJS Communication](https://github.com/harshitvsaxena/Resources/tree/master/Nginx-and-NodeJS-Communication)
- [RethinkDB with Docker](https://github.com/harshitvsaxena/Resources/tree/master/RethinkDB-with-Docker)
  - [Installing Docker](https://github.com/harshitvsaxena/Resources/tree/master/RethinkDB-with-Docker/installing_docker.md)
  - [Playing With Docker](https://github.com/harshitvsaxena/Resources/tree/master/RethinkDB-with-Docker/playing_with_docker.md)
  - [Setting Up RethinkDB](https://github.com/harshitvsaxena/Resources/tree/master/RethinkDB-with-Docker/setting_up_rethinkdb.md)
- [Ubuntu](Ubuntu)
  - [Installing Ubuntu](https://github.com/harshitvsaxena/Resources/tree/master/Ubuntu/installing_ubuntu.md)
  - [Software Management In Ubuntu](https://github.com/harshitvsaxena/Resources/tree/master/Ubuntu/software_management_in_ubuntu.md)
- [Bugs and Fixes](https://github.com/harshitvsaxena/Resources/tree/master/Bugs-and-Fixes)
  - [runit Bug](https://github.com/harshitvsaxena/Resources/tree/master/Bugs-and-Fixes/runit_bug.md)

---

## Thank You
